about.content: <par>Graduated from the École Normale Supérieure de Paris with a PhD in numerical modeling, I chose to redirect my career towards Web software engineering, a field that allows me to realize my passion for creating impactful technological solutions.</par><par>Initially oriented towards fundamental research, I realized that I am more attracted to projects offering more concrete results in the social sphere. This realization, combined with a strong entrepreneurial spirit, led me to dive into the development of an innovative Web application dedicated to the analysis of trading strategies. This project allowed me to master Web technologies, particularly the MERN stack, while practicing my passion for development, which I have been diligently pursuing for over ten years.</par><par>My scientific expertise enables me to tackle technical challenges with a rigorous analytical approach, while my experience in Web development demonstrates my ability to deliver robust and scalable applications. Versatile and adaptable, I am very comfortable working in a team, with a developed sense of pedagogy and communication.</par><par>Today, I am enthusiastic about putting my interdisciplinary skills to work on innovative and ambitious projects, where I am convinced I can bring significant added value.</par>

experience.diving_bear_description: Conception and development of a web application for trading analysis.
experience.phd_description: Building cutting-edge physical and numerical models with Damage mechanisms to study the dynamics of the Earth's crust over large space and temporal scales.
phd_description_list: Manipulated complex Mathematical and computational concepts.
Presented research findings at international conferences and workshops.
Collaborated with a team of geophysicists to interpret the models results and publish research papers.
Contributed in educational activities by teaching and supervising undergraduate to master's students.

education.ens_degree: Third Year, Master's, and Doctoral Degrees in Quantitative Earth Sciences
education.ipgp_institution: Institut de Physique du Globe de Paris
education.ipgp_degree: Second Year of Master's in Geophysics
education.ipgp_description: I specialized in seismology and geodynamics, and learned to model the Earth's interior and study its dynamics.
education.sorbonne_degree: First and Second Year in Geosciences
